# tf.test.is_built_with_cuda

Returns whether TensorFlow was built with CUDA (GPU) support.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/test/is_built_with_cuda"><code>tf.compat.v1.test.is_built_with_cuda</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/test/is_built_with_cuda"><code>tf.compat.v2.test.is_built_with_cuda</code></a>


``` python
tf.test.is_built_with_cuda()
```
